metadata.name: Epivir 150 mg film coated tablets Epivir 300 mg film coated tablets
metadata.composition: Epivir 150 mg film coated tablets Each film coated tablet contains 150 mg lamivudine Epivir 300 mg film coated tablets Each film coated tablet contains 300 mg lamivudine

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Epivir is indicated as part of antiretroviral combination therapy for the treatment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus HIV infected adults and children

contraindications.disease: Hypersensitivity to the active substance or to any of the excipients listed in section 6 1
contraindications.excipients: Microcrystalline cellulose (E460);Sodium starch glycollate;Magnesium stearate;Hypromellose (E464);Titanium dioxide (E171);Macrogol;Polysorbate 80;Microcrystalline cellulose (E460);Sodium starch glycollate;Magnesium stearate;Hypromellose (E464);Titanium dioxide (E171);Black iron oxide (E172);Macrogol, Polysorbate 80
